article.title: One Day Food Diary: 12 Best Places To Eat In The Cameron Highlands
article.lead_paragraph: You would be surprised at how many great eateries there are in the Cameron Highlands! Along with the cooling mountain breeze and lush greenery, you can enjoy everything from spicy and flavorful Indian cuisine to fresh seafood at a Japanese steamboat buffet. There are many eateries scattered around the mountain. With so many to choose from, here are the 12 best places to eat in the Cameron Highlands!
article.proposal:
BREAKFAST 
1)	The Dining Room at Cameron Highlands Resort

>

TEA

DINNER

article.meta_description: From hearty Indian food, to Japanese and Chinese steamboats or a full English spread, you just need to know where to look on the mountain! Here are the 12 best places to eat in the Cameron Highlands!

snippets.title: 1) Decadent western breakfast spread at The Dining Room
snippets.title_with_numbering: 1) Decadent western breakfast spread at The Dining Room

snippets.description:
A post shared by ‚ìê‚ìò‚ìö‚ìò‚ì®‚ìû üíô (@aikiyo) on Nov 7, 2016 at 4:56pm PST

The perfect breakfast spread, The Dining Room at Cameron Highlands Resort has everything from daily fresh pastries, fruits and yogurt, cereals, eggs, pancakes and other western breakfast food to guarantee a great start to your day! Feasting in a sun-flooded dining hall, your eyes will be treated to a great view of lush mountaintops as well as a vibrant green golf course! > #### The Dining Room > > **Address**: Cameron Highlands, 39000, Tanah Rata, Pahang, Malaysia, 39000 Tanah Rata, Malaysia > > **Opening Hours**: +60 16-544 5713 > > **Contact**: Breakfast 7.00 A.M. ‚Äì 10.30 A.M.

Voted one of the best restaurants in the Cameron highlands, you can find some great Malaysian classics here like Curry Mee, Nasi Lemak, Prawn Noodle and of course toast and a half-boiled egg at Uncle Chow Kopitiam.

snippets.title: 3)	Authentic Chinese food at Delicious & Happiness Kitchen
snippets.title_with_numbering: 3)	Authentic Chinese food at Delicious & Happiness Kitchen

snippets.description:
<iframe src="https://www.facebook.com/plugins/post.php?href=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com%2Fphoto.php%3Ffbid%3D725426480828483%26set%3Da.411837848854016.82481.100000834120796%26type%3D3&width=500" width="500" height="380" style="border:none;overflow:hidden" scrolling="no" frameborder="0" allowTransparency="true"></iframe>

For good, authentic Chinese food, Delicious & Happiness Kitchen is a local favourite go-to in Cameron! They don't have an English menu, so if you're rusty on your Chinese language, have a waiter recommend some local favorites such as the herbal pork ribs, asam prawns or sweet and sour chicken. Whatever you end up ordering, satisfaction is guaranteed! 

> #### Delicious & Happiness Kitchen 
>
> **Address**:  no.16, Bawah Jalan Angsana 1, Brinchang point, Cameron Higlands, 39100 Brinchang, Pahang, Malaysia
>
> **Opening Hours**:  11.00 A.M. ‚Äì 10.00 P.M.
>
> **Contact**: +60 12-345 8573

snippets.title: 4)	Variety of western lunch menu items at Barracks Cafe
snippets.title_with_numbering: 4)	Variety of western lunch menu items at Barracks Cafe

snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BJ2eulyBO7x/?taken-by=barrackscafe

A cafe housed in a vintage military barrack, Barracks Caf√© has variety of western dishes from pasta to rice, as well cakes and pastries you can enjoy in their blooming garden! This is a must visit if you're into themed cafes, like the ones you'd find in [Johor Bahru](https://trip101.com/article/10-uniquely-themed-cafes-in-johor-bahru-malaysia)!

> #### Barracks Cafe
>
> **Address**:  No 1, Jalan Gereja, Tanah Rata, 39000 Tanah Rata, Pahang, Malaysia
>
> **Opening Hours**:  Weekdays 2.00 P.M. ‚Äì 10.00 P.M. | Weekends 10.00 A.M ‚Äì 10.00 P.M. (Closed on Monday)
>
> **Contact**: +60 11-1464 8883
>**Facebook**: [Barracks Cafe](https://www.facebook.com/thebarrackscafe/)

snippets.title: 5)	Classic English tea at Jim Thompson Tea Room
snippets.title_with_numbering: 5)	Classic English tea at Jim Thompson Tea Room

snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BP140zhgDYM/

Have a relaxing afternoon indulging in the age-old tradition of English afternoon tea. The Jim Thompson Tea Room serves you three-tiers of finger foods such as oven-fresh pastries, delicate sandwiches, homemade scones, clotted cream, strawberry jam and plump strawberries complemented by a hot pot of Cameron Highland Tea! 

> #### Jim Thompson Tea Room
>
> **Address**:  Cameron Highland, 39000 Brinchang, Pahang, Malaysia
>
> **Opening Hours**:  English Afternoon Tea 3.00 P.M. ‚Äì 6.00 P.M. 
>
> **Contact**: +60 14-230 3849

snippets.title: 6)	Best Scones in Cameron at The Lord‚Äôs Cafe
snippets.title_with_numbering: 6)	Best Scones in Cameron at The Lord‚Äôs Cafe

snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BjkT5ViAShE/?taken-at=666317

Get the best, crumbly, melt-in-your-mouth scones at The Lord's Cafe in Tanah Rata and complement your high tea with their selection of crepes, fresh lassi drinks, delicious pies and cakes! Don't have a sweet-tooth? The Lord's Cafe also serves a full menu of decadent homemade soups, burgers, sandwiches and pastas!


> #### The Lord‚Äôs Cafe
>
> **Address**:  Jalan Besar, Tanah Rata, 39000 Tanah Rata, Pahang, Malaysia
>
> **Opening Hours**:  10.00 A.M. ‚Äì 7.00 P.M. (Closed on Sundays)
>
> **Contact**: +60 19-572 2883

snippets.title: 7)	Delicious fruit pancakes at Yong Teng Cafe
snippets.title_with_numbering: 7)	Delicious fruit pancakes at Yong Teng Cafe

snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BVJxjsXgA_5/?hl=en&taken-at=270349415

Better tasting than it looks, you'll be delighted to have this humble eatery's version of fruit pancakes, made with sweet ripe bananas and juicy strawberries from the Cameron gardens! Top that off with a generous scoop of ice cream and you've got yourself a winner! 

> #### Yong Teng Cafe
>
> **Address**:  Tanah Rata, 39000 Tanah Rata, Pahang, Malaysia
>
> **Opening Hours**:  7.00 A.M. ‚Äì 5.00 P.M.

snippets.title: 8)	Flavorful Indian cuisine at Singh Chapati Urban Restaurant
snippets.title_with_numbering: 8)	Flavorful Indian cuisine at Singh Chapati Urban Restaurant

snippets.description:
A post shared by Shakir Sofian (@shakirsofian) on May 1, 2016 at 5:09am PDT

Affordable, flavorful and comes in big portions, checking off all three selling points for tourists and Malaysians alike! Singh Chapati is the best place to get great Indian cuisine in the Cameron Highlands! > #### Singh Chapati Urban Restaurant > > **Address**: Tanah Rata, 39000 Tanah Rata, Pahang, Malaysia > > **Opening Hours**: 1.00 P.M. ‚Äì 9.30 P.M. > > **Contact**: +60 17-578 6465 > **Facebook**: [Singh Chapati Urban Restaurant](https://www.facebook.com/SINGHCHAPATI/)

snippets.description:
A post shared by Thomas Ustrup (@ustrup78) on Jul 26, 2016 at 5:18am PDT

Steamboat is a widely popular shared meal around Malaysia. Gonbei offers a place for Japanese steamboat that is popular in the Cameron Highlands, serving you and your loved ones fresh local produce, seafood and prime slices of meat to be dunk and cooked in the aromatic broth of your choice! > #### Gonbei > > **Address**: Jalan Bukit Bintang, Bukit Bintang, 55100 Kuala Lumpur, Wilayah Persekutuan Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia > > **Opening Hours**: Dinner 7.00 P.M. ‚Äì 10.00 P.M. > > **Contact**: +60 3-2782 3801

snippets.title: 10)	Mouthwatering English dinner at The Ole Smokehouse Restaurant
snippets.title_with_numbering: 10)	Mouthwatering English dinner at The Ole Smokehouse Restaurant

snippets.description:
A post shared by KelvinÈÑ≠ (@aspironz) on Jan 29, 2017 at 9:21pm PST

Have a great English dinner of dark brown, caramelized roast chicken, steak pies and more, in the gorgeous setting of a Tudor-style building surrounded by a beautiful garden landscape! > #### The Smokehouse Hotel & Restaurant > > **Address**: By the Golf Course, Tanah Rata, 39000 Ringlet, Malaysia > > **Contact**: +60 5-491 1215

snippets.title: 11) Try the Chinese Steamboat meal at May Flower Restaurant
snippets.title_with_numbering: 11) Try the Chinese Steamboat meal at May Flower Restaurant
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/BMbVjdrhTO1/?taken-at=136604256
A Chinese Steamboat is similar to a fondue or hot pot, where you cook at the table. However, at the May Flower, you cook Chinese food. At the May Flower, there's a good mix of meat, seafood, and vegetables. On a cool night, it's a pleasant way to pass the time in the small restaurant. 
https://www.instagram.com/p/BkCt7v9hNW9/
The waiter will assist and explain about the choices. They cater to vegetarians, plus the Tom yum soup is delicious. Generous portions of noodles accompany the meal. There are alternative items on the menu as well.
> #### May Flower Restaurant
>
> **Address**:  77A Persiaranm Camellia 4 | 77A Persiaranm Camellia 4, Tanah Rata, Malaysia
>
> **Telephone**: +60 5-491 1793

snippets.title: 12) Try the strawberry sambal at 200 Seeds Cafe
snippets.title_with_numbering: 12) Try the strawberry sambal at 200 Seeds Cafe
snippets.description:
https://www.instagram.com/p/Bo-peWRhS6P/?taken-at=1022209636
Not only can you try the strawberry sambal at the 200 Seeds cafe, but you can pick some strawberries at Abang Strawberry. Additionally, they have a gift shop. The Nasi Lemak Sambal Strawberry comes recommended. The popular Nasi Lemak is said to nicely balance between sour and spicey. 

Guests can also try some strawberry tea. They do have other things on the menu and their scones are delicious. There s a photo booth and the farm makes for some nice photo opportunities. This is a pleasant place for the family to visit. Allow at least two hours to enjoy your meal and strawberry picking.
> ####  200 Seeds Cafe
>
> **Address**:  27 Kampung Taman Sedia, Tanah Rata, Malaysia
>
> **Website**: [200 Seeds Cafe](https://web.facebook.com/200SeedsCafe/?ref=br_rs)

Guests can also try some strawberry tea. They do have other things on the menu and their scones are delicious. There s a photo booth and the farm makes for some nice photo opportunities. snippets.title: How to satisfy a foodie
snippets.description: Proven here, at the altitude of 1300 meters (4265 feet), great food can be found just about anywhere in Malaysia! Whether you're exploring [Malacca](https://trip101.com/article/taste-the-culture-8-prized-malaccan-dishes-where-locals-find-them)  or strolling around the streets of [Kuala Lumpur](https://trip101.com/article/variety-for-muslim-travellers-10-best-halal-restaurants-in-kl) or [Johor Bahru](https://trip101.com/article/malaysia-s-underrated-food-trail-10-best-foods-to-try-in-johor-bahru), if there's one thing Malaysia does best, it's satisfying a foodie on vacation!

embed.value: Proven here, at the altitude of 1300 meters (4265 feet), great food can be found just about anywhere in Malaysia! Whether you're exploring [Malacca](https://trip101.com/article/taste-the-culture-8-prized-malaccan-dishes-where-locals-find-them)  or strolling around the streets of [Kuala Lumpur](https://trip101.com/article/variety-for-muslim-travellers-10-best-halal-restaurants-in-kl) or [Johor Bahru](https://trip101.com/article/malaysia-s-underrated-food-trail-10-best-foods-to-try-in-johor-bahru), if there's one thing Malaysia does best, it's satisfying a foodie on vacation!

article.keyword: places to eat in the cameron highlands

lead_paragraph_embed.value: You would be surprised at how many great eateries there are in the Cameron Highlands! Along with the cooling mountain breeze and lush greenery, you can enjoy everything from spicy and flavorful Indian cuisine to fresh seafood at a Japanese steamboat buffet. There are many eateries scattered around the mountain. With so many to choose from, here are the 12 best places to eat in the Cameron Highlands!

navigator.introduction: Ihsan Ihsani is a Malaysian writer who loves to write about anything that sparks his curiosity. He travels to broaden his horizon on the many cultures and beauties of the world. When limited funds prohibit him from checking off his next travel destination, you can find him travelling via Google Street View to cure his wanderlust. If he's not writing freelance travel pieces or reading on perfecting his craft, he is writing to grow his website,The New Ed; promoting self-dependent intellectual growth for millennials like him.
